member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO
member.summary: Contains symbol server index information.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.sizeofstruct
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. This member must be set to sizeof(SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO) or sizeof(SYMSRV_INDEX_INFOW).

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.file
member.summary: The name of the .pdb, .dbg, or image file.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.stripped
member.summary: A value that indicates whether the image file is stripped.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.timestamp
member.summary: The timestamp from the PE header. This member is used only for image files.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.size
member.summary: The file size from the PE header. This member is used only for image files.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.dbgfile
member.summary: If the image file is stripped and there is a .dbg file, this member is the path to the .dbg file from the CV record.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.pdbfile
member.summary: The .pdb file from the CV record. This member is used only for image and .dbg files.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.guid
member.summary: The GUID of the .pdb file. If there is no GUID available, the signature of the .pdb file is copied into first DWORD of the GUID.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.sig
member.summary: The signature of the .pdb file (for use with old-style .pdb files). This value can be 0 if it is a new-style .pdb file that uses a GUID-length signature.

member.name: SYMSRV_INDEX_INFO.age
member.summary: The age of the .pdb file.
